Name: Highlander
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Scotch whisky-based Sweet Manhattan with orange bitters.
History: A Rob Roy with orange bitters. In his seminal 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks , David Embury notes under his Rob Roy entry, " If orange bitters are used instead of Angostura, this drink is sometimes called the Highland, or the Highland Fling, or the Express. I discovered it as the "Highlander" in 2010 on the menu of the Campbell Apartment in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Highlander contains 179 calories
